title: David Becomes King Over All Israel
summary: David is anointed king over all Israel and establishes Jerusalem as the capital. He defeats the Jebusites and secures multiple victories over the Philistines with Godâ€™s guidance.

faq.question: When did David become king over all Israel?
faq.answer: At age 30, after reigning over Judah for 7 years, he was made king of all 12 tribes.

faq.question: What city did David conquer and make his capital?
faq.answer: Jerusalem, also known as Zion or the City of David.
